thread.title: VP Mike Pence Set to Make History Tomorrow at March for Life, Will be the First to…
thread.title_full: VP Mike Pence Set to Make History Tomorrow at March for Life, Will be the First to…

author: John S. Roberts
title: VP Mike Pence Set to Make History Tomorrow at March for Life, Will be the First to…
text:
Tomorrow will mark the 44th annual ‘March for Life’ rally in Washington D.C. 
While the unborn are being given a voice, the mainstream media isn’t expected to pay much attention. 
However, it will be a historic day. 
Vice President Mike Pence will be the first administration official to attend the event as he is set to give a speech. 
Presidents Ronald Reagan and George W. Bush addressed the pro-life rally in 1987 and 2003, respectively, but did so via telephone. 
The media is now in the crosshairs. 
With Vice President Pence now on the official schedule, the media has a choice to make. 
Now, let’s all sit back and watch as lefties and the media vilify the hundreds of thousands who will show up to fight for the most innocent. 
SMH.
